content:
You wake feeling refreshed and head straight to the festival in the light of the dawn. Already there are hundreds of people here enjoying the festivities and hundreds more following behind. The aroma of freshly brewed tea, honey rolls, and sizzling sausages beckons.

Spirits are high, and you quickly learn of an enormous feast planned for later this evening. Until then you have all day to spend with your friends and acquaintences, to enjoy the festival's many activities, and to sample its many delicacies, both savory and sweet.

Search the path deck and discard for Festival Grounds and put it into play (do not read its entry). If GROUNDS PREPARED, Festival Grounds enters play with 0 tasks on it.

Flip the THE FESTIVITIES BEGIN mission over to its FUN AND GAMES side, but don't update your campaign tracker.

Search the Spire, Spire Crossing, and Silverfin Docks sets for the following humans and shuffle them into the path deck: Dace, Elder Mora Orlin, Tollin Lang, Bo Talos, and Raemon.

Add mirth to your friends by clearing them with   before the feast begins.
